protocol.name: P-GSE35325-2
protocol.text: After 3 days seedlings of the same developmental stage were selected (seedlings not meeting the dev. stage were removed from the plates). After 4 days seedlings were exposed to volatiles of bacteria (Serratia plymuthica HRO-C48 or Stenotrophomonas maltophilia R3089) by applying a bacteria culture of 10^7 CFU to the other half of the split-dish plates. Mock treated (with bacteria growth media) plates were also kept. For both mock treated and volatile-treated samples, pooled seedlings (from 5 diff. plates) from the respective time points were used for RNA extraction. Two biological replicates were performed.

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-3
protocol.text: Surface sterilized seeds from Arabidopsis thaliana Col-0 (by ethanol (2 min 70 %), calcium hypochloride(5 min 1 %), washed 4 times with steril dH2O) were plated on 0.5 MS 0.8 % Agar split-dish plates. Plated seeds were stratified for  3 days at 4°C. Seed/Seedlings were grown under  22°C +/-2°C; 100 +/-10 µE/m-2/s-1; 16 h light/ 8 h dark; 50 +/-10 % humidity.

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-4
protocol.text: For RNA extraction RNeasy Plant Mini kit was used ( according instructions from Quiagen).  Extracted RNA was precipitated: 96 µl RNA;  8 µl 3 M Sodium acetate (pH 5.2); 2 µl Glycogen(5 mg/ml); Ethanol 250 µl. Stored at -80°C for 15 days, than 30 min 13000 rpm 4°C. 2 times washing with 500 µl 70 % ethanol. Resuspended in 50 µl DEPC water. RNA quantity and integrity were assessed using RNA 6000 Nano LabChip Kit and the BioAnalyzer software (Agilent).

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-5
protocol.text: 1 µg of total RNA were used to synthesize amplified labeled cRNA (MessageAmp™ II aRNA Amplification Kit; Ambion).

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-6
protocol.text: After fragmentation of cRNA using the RNA Fragmentation Reagents (Ambion), 14,25 µg of cRNA was hybridized to Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (ATH1-121501; GEO accession GPL198) according to manufacturers manual. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 using the protocol 'EukGE-WS2V4'.

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip® scanner GS3000 7G according to manufacturers manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE35325-8
protocol.text: The data was anylysed with GeneSpring GX (vers. 7.3) from Agilent. Preprocessing was performed with included RMA Plugin.
